    • Constructor Detail

      • CircularFifoBuffer

        public CircularFifoBuffer(int capacity)

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(E e)
        Adds the given element to the buffer. If the buffer is full, the least recently added element is discarded so that a new element can be inserted.

      • remove

        public E remove()
        Removes and returns the least recently inserted element from this buffer.

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Returns true iff the buffers remaining capacity is 0.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true iff the buffers size is 0.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of elements in the buffer.

      • toArray

        public java.lang.Object[] toArray()
